title: Why Is No One Talking About PlayStation VR? - PS I Love You XOXO Ep. 53
description:
We're less than a month from PlayStation VR's release, so why does it seem like no one's talking about it? (Released 09.20.16)

Thanks to Indochino, Dollar Shave Club, and Zip Recruiter for sponsoring this episode! Go to http://www.indochino.com and use promo code: XOXO,  http://www.ziprecruiter.com/loveyou , and http://www.dollarshaveclub.com/love


Subscribe! https://www.youtube.com/user/kindafun...

Get you PS I Love You XOXO shirts and posters: http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Listen to today's artist here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A0N3tRzI8Mw

Submit questions for the show here: http://www.kindafunny.com/psq

Greg and Colin are back with a weekly PlayStation podcast. Catch it on YouTube and podcast services each and every Tuesday at 9 a.m. PT!

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids
